name: MyfirstJamVadim
description:
Hello, says Google translator.

You can only choose one instrument. Will you be able to fend off the monsters and improve at the same time, or will you be gnawed on the first night? It's time to check it out. Six tools, 3 appearances in a day and night full of monsters. Hover and learn about the bays, approach them and interact. Get resources, find Easter eggs and enjoy music. Try different builds!

We didn't have time to adjust the balance, lol)

In the afternoon - Lofi - https://clck.ru/WgpnL

At night - ZXC - https://clck.ru/Wgpmj

Press RMB to continue.
